title: Design of Constructivist Teaching Methods Based on Online Literature (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic literacy skills and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: PBL Design Integrating Literature and Constructivism in a Smartphone-Centric Restricted Technology Environment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze social issues using narrative expressions with digital texts
Learners can complete collaborative writing projects based on constructivist instructional methods
Learners can apply literary methodologies (metaphor, narrative structure, etc.) to online learning content

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
